Season

Application Security Platform

TR7 Load Balancing and Web Application Firewall

Detailed Information Our Products

With TR7

Plug-and-Play

TR7 is designed for companies that want a high-performance, uninterrupted plug-and-play system to balance application flows and guarantee the highest availability of critical application platforms / servers.

Cost Effective

TR7 ASP, Open source components are optimized and used with reliable hardware platforms, provides business partners with advantageous prices at more competitive prices compared to other LB manufacturers.

High Scalable

With different boxes, it is adapted to every need with parallel operating modes (active-passive / active-active / passive-passive) depending on the processing power, infrastructure needs and critical level.




TR7 Load Balancing and Application Security products are designed to solve general IT needs effectively and affordably. By offering leading solutions in the field, it brings customer support and satisfaction to the highest level.

For more information please Contact us.
